complexParameter.name: script
script
script
script
complexParameter.core:text:
// this groovy script searches for the (en) text of 'drilling_method_id_cli' // defined in the source table 'codelist' and classifies the result
def c = _.context.collector() def textEn = c.codelist[drilling_method_id_cli].value()
switch (textEn){ case 'not specified': return 'UN'
case 'auger drilling': return 'DB'
case 'manual drilling': return 'HB'
case 'other ': return 'W'
case 'dynamic probing': return 'RB'
case 'direct push soil sampling': return 'SK'
case 'percussion drilling': return 'SA'
case 'rotary drilling': return 'DBO'
case 'rotary coring': return 'RKB'
case 'wireline core drilling': return 'SKB'
case 'grab drilling': return 'TG' }

complexParameter.name: script
